title: Cruzer Pizza
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Pizza, Italian, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out
description: Pizzeria converted to being all vegan since winter of 2009. Serves vegan pizza with Daiya cheese, calzones, sandwiches, appetizers and different kinds of pasta. Offers vegan meat toppings as well as gluten-free pizza crust. Mostly takeout, small space with a table for 2 plus a couple tall stools. Parking available in front lot and on the street.
